metadata.title: USN-7049-1 -- PHP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled parsing multipart form data. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to inject payloads and cause PHP to ignore legitimate data. (CVE-2024-8925)  It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled the cgi.force_redirect configuration option due to environment variable collisions. In certain configurations, an attacker could possibly use this issue bypass force_redirect restrictions. (CVE-2024-8927)  It was discovered that PHP-FPM incorrectly handled logging. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to alter and inject arbitrary contents into log files. This issue only affected Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, and Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (CVE-2024-9026)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7049-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache2-mod-php7.4 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 libapache2-mod-php8.0 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 libapache2-mod-php8.1 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 libphp8.1-embed - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-bcmath - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-bz2 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-cgi - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-cli - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-common - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-curl - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-dba - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-dev - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-enchant - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-fpm - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-gd - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-gmp - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-imap - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-interbase - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-intl - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-ldap - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-mbstring - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-mysql - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-odbc - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-opcache - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-pgsql - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-phpdbg - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-pspell - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-readline - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-snmp - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-soap - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-sqlite3 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-sybase - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-tidy - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-xml - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-xsl - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 php8.1-zip - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.19 No subscription required
